headline: Aflac hacked: Social Security numbers, claims, and health data at risk in insurance firm cyberattack
summary: The company confirmed today that it was breached by hackers, who may have stolen sensitive information from its millions of customers. Here’s what to know.

raw.headline: Aflac hacked: Social Security numbers, claims, and health data at risk in insurance firm cyberattack
raw.summary: The company confirmed today that it was breached by hackers, who may have stolen sensitive information from its millions of customers. Here’s what to know.

headline: Aflac Says 'Sophisticated Cybercrime Group' Accessed Customers' Personal Data
summary: Aflac said Friday that its network was hit by a cyberattack that affected an unknown number of customers' personal information.

raw.headline: Aflac Says 'Sophisticated Cybercrime Group' Accessed Customers' Personal Data
raw.summary: Aflac said Friday that its network was hit by a cyberattack that affected an unknown number of customers' personal information.

headline: Aflac Says Personal Info May Have Been Stolen in Cyberattack
summary: Aflac has been hit with a cyberattack that may have resulted in the theft of personal data related to the insurer’s U.S. business.

raw.headline: Aflac Says Personal Info May Have Been Stolen in Cyberattack
raw.summary: Aflac has been hit with a cyberattack that may have resulted in the theft of personal data related to the insurer’s U.S. business.

headline: Insurer Aflac investigating possible data breach after attack on US network
summary: The health and life insurance firm said the attack on its U.S. network, which was identified on June 12, was caused by a "sophisticated cybercrime group", but did not specify a name.  The company said it was able to stop the intrusion within hours and has reached out to third-party cybersecurity experts to investigate into the incident.  The company said the potentially impacted files contain personal information of its customers, such as social security numbers and health-related details.

raw.headline: Insurer Aflac investigating possible data breach after attack on US network

The company said the potentially impacted files contain personal information of its customers, such as social security numbers and health-related details.

headline: Aflac Incorporated Discloses Cybersecurity Incident
summary: On June 12, 2025, Aflac Incorporated (NYSE: AFL) identified suspicious activity on our network in the United States. We promptly initiated our cyber incident response protocols and stopped the intrusion within hours. Importantly, our business remains operational, and our systems were not affected by ransomware. We continue to serve our customers as we respond to this incident and can underwrite policies, review claims, and otherwise service our customers as usual. This attack, like many insuranc

headline: Aflac discloses cyber intrusion linked to wider crime spree targeting insurance industry
summary: The breach marks the latest in a series of recent attacks linked to cybercrime group Scattered Spider.
